# Mode Function 

## Brief description 
The mode function gives the most commonly occurring values of a dataset.

## What package contains it
The mode function is part of the base R statistical software package. 

## When to use it
The mode function can be used when you want to compare the central tendency in a dataset, but the data is not normally distributed or contains outliers. The mode is particularly useful when the data is ordinal, nominal, or categorical.
